div.h3: 2011-05-07: i2py-tahoe and over 3000 active nodes each day
div.p: A new implementation of tahoe-lafs arrived for I2P. I2Py-tahoe uses BOB, has active development and has setup a second grid. Currently this version is not compatible with ducks implementation of tahoe-lafs.
Latest graph on stats.i2p does show a estimated total active router count of 3000 hit at each day of last week. I2P is still growing.
New development version is available on echelons page. It includes more tweaks against a powerful attacker.
New development version available. Minor changes included as some enhancements to the UPnP code.

New I2P version! ¡Bienvenidos hispanohablantes et bienvenue les français! I2P router console is now fully translated for our French and Spanish speaking friends. The 0.8.5 release contains a few bug fixes and performance improvements, and lots of other translation updates. Also, some security holes were closed and new limits established in order to prevent a DOS attack on the I2P network, as shown by a research project by TU Munich that dealt with I2P. Tunnel building was modified not to create tunnels in the A-B-A or A-A-B peer order to prevent some basic attacks. So you see, as usual, upgrading is worthwhile and recommended.

Please help grow the network. Say hello to the volunteers on the #i2p-help IRC channel. Get involved, spread the word, and donate! If you find a bug, please enter a report on trac. We are still looking for volunteers to work on new and existing translations. Please volunteer on IRC #i2p-dev.
